it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.network

Interface RemoteView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote, RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PersistentView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientView, PersistentViewImpl, SocketRemoteView

    public interface RemoteView
extends RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate>, Remote
    Interface provided by the view of a remote host.

    Provides methods to:

    • Get information about the player owning the view
    • Interact with the user by sending choice requests
    • Show message with various warning levels
    • Select the scene, i.e. the interface that the user sees
    • Check connectivity

    Classes implementing this must also accept observers, which will be notified with a ChoiceResponse whenever a choice is asked with a ChoiceRequest is performed. The response must have the same UUID as the request. The response is not required anymore if the player owning the view gets suspended, or if the match terminates for any reason.

    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

      • getUsername

        String getUsername()
            throws IOException
        Returns the username of the player associated with this view. It returns null if the username has not already been set (prior to login)
        Returns:
        username of the player, if it has been set, null otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if the remote call fails
